none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on May 11, 2019 Description from Terminal Escape:
Knuckledragging slack jawed garage Oi!, the way that only punks taking the piss can deliver. Raw and feisty punk, with CARBONAS caliber hooks and OIL! level irreverence. Only four tracks here, but the opening of "What A Brilliant Future" pretty much gets the point across in a few seconds. The rest is gravy....until you get to the MotörCruiser "Nothin' For The USA" and you realize that you never knew how delicious gravy could be.  BRAINSMASHER

seo.title: Brainsmasher - Brainsmasher demo 2017 - Terminal Escape
